Title: Duplicate Advisory: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature in aws-encryption-sdk-java
Description:
## Duplicate Advisory
This advisory has been withdrawn because it is a duplicate of GHSA-55xh-53m6-936r. This link is maintained to preserve external references.

## Original Description
AWS Encryption SDK for Java versions 2.0.0 to 2.2.0 and less than 1.9.0 incorrectly validates some invalid ECDSA signatures.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.9.0, all versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.2.0
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.9.0 before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.2.0
